column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have been going to this place for years
column2: even though I don't live in the neighborhood. I think it's hands-down the best tapas in the city. The bacon-wrapped dates are fantastic
column3: and so are the manchego-stuffed mushrooms and the little pinxtos. When you go
column4: you must try the sangria too. I'm not usually a huge fan of sangria (too sweet)
column5: but here it is pretty much the perfect mix.
